Articles.Content:
Looks like KSP is about to get some competition... ;P

http://space.angrybirds.com/teaser1/
Let\'s transport some birds to orbit

i think this is inspired by soyuz tma-22 launch from nov last year, hehe

http://youtu.be/oYCIeeqCTnM
Wow, you\'d think they could at least have picked that stick up off the ground before they took the picture of 'The Moon'.
I wonder if they are going to do just planets with different gravities and environments or have maps in space where you slingshot around different planets.

I don\'t think this will be any harm to any space-sim game. (I\'m pretty sure KSP is considered one..)

Angry Birds is about killing pigs and destroying objects, this will probably be turned into aliens in Angry Birds: Space.

I don\'t think this will be any harm to any space-sim game. (I\'m pretty sure KSP is considered one..)

Angry Birds is about killing pigs and destroying objects, this will probably be turned into aliens in Angry Birds: Space.

The 'competition' line was a joke, because the site showed the surface of the moon with the AngryBirds slingshot standing there...
